name: test_e2e_with_logs[006_SQLI_ADV_080]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_ADV_080` |
| **Name** | MySQL Comment Bypass UNION |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | advanced |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `/*!50000UNION*/SELECT`
- **Encoded**: `%2F%2A%2150000UNION%2A%2FSELECT`
